narrative: Scanned trading-related memory keys via tushell, retrieved selected memories, stored them under specs/edgekeysouces. Created summary clustering JSON for future feature extraction.
purpose: Gather memory references for trading spec integration, enable structured referencing in specs and future features.
scene: Prior to this addition the repository lacked direct context from the memory keys. Now developers can consult the JSON summaries to design features aligned with historical ritual data.
